articles.title: How Germany's Economy Is Hurt by Supply Chain Shortages - Flipboard
articles.description: FRANKFURT — In Germany, where one in four jobs depends on exports, the crisis gumming up the world’s supply chains is weighing heavily on the economy, which is Europe’s largest and a linchpin to global commerce. Recent surveys and data point to a sharp slowdo…
